name: Zombiezz Rebuild
description:
How to Play?

WASD  To Move Or Arrow Keys.

 To Fire Left Mouse Button And To Reload Right Mouse Button

There IS HP Box And Ammo Box in corner if you need collide with it.

Rebulid 3 Generator then door will open.you have to escape from park.....

How to Fix Generator?

Press Spacebar when you are in Range.

Check Out Devlog On Youtubel(Channel Name SauceSea Dev)(Coming soon)

Click Below

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp__qPXWA5n4eD6Q0gxbVkg

In the Times Of Zombie Era you are locked in park where zombies are spawning, you have to fix Generator In order to escape the park. You are undercover agent with secret mission.
